eclipses.title: Aquarius New Moon → Feb 17, 2026
eclipses.future_theme: Prototype the future with peers: networks, tech, and social experiments.

echoes.blurb: Web and global networks scale into daily life; Uranus–Neptune era.

eclipses.title: Virgo Full Moon → Mar 3, 2026
eclipses.future_theme: Health, work, and process culminate. Refine the system; cut friction.

echoes.blurb: Public health infrastructure, clean water, and urban reforms.
Process improvement reduces waste and increases reliability.

eclipses.title: Leo New Moon → Aug 12, 2026
eclipses.future_theme: Create boldly. Launch performances, brands, and heart-led work.

echoes.blurb: Studio era; star power, spectacle, and mass culture.
Counterculture apex; music as social force.

eclipses.title: Pisces Full Moon → Aug 28, 2026
eclipses.future_theme: Emotional tides crest; spiritual/service themes culminate. Rest, release, restore.

echoes.blurb: Saturn–Pluto in Capricorn; systemic stress and institutional reset.
Florence Nightingale and professionalized care models.
